item.description:
Hello Boston Chihuahua Members!!!

This month I thought we'd try out a new indoor location. This location is only available 10am-12pm. If collectively we dont like it and/or the earlier time we dont have to continue with it. Its a trial basis right now.

Please note that this location REQUIRES you to bring in Rabies and Distemper paperwork on your dog. The space is being rented by our group so unfortunately the fee/cost of attending has gone up. Enjoy complimentary coffee, tea, and hot chocolate in the "human only" area where you can sit at the tables and watch your dog play. For more information on the venue, visit www.momandpaws.com

Â 

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee
item.name: May 2012: Indoor Meetup @ Mom & Paws
